1553607490_1NYxK9cC899pvxFuCt6eE53APoueD.body: This all happened because the French traded their North Stream 2 gaspipelines with the EU for Copyright Directive - that way the representatives HAD to vote in favor of the directive. That was a very dirty move from FR ... The lobby agenda was very strong these last days too, using dirty ways to win this battle (blackmailing representatives with bad press, etc..).  In the end, they got what they wanted... Time will tell how the feared directive will manifest to the real world and if there will still be a way to enjoy the internet as before (the clearnet will most likely become a commercial plattform).

1554110095_18n7wVi3xtKGEp4a4BYPuhEdfMszt.body: I would rather not like to see a upload filter here ... (unless the owner is forced to implement one)
